    Validates that the given name contains only alphabetic letters and spaces.
    static void
    ValidationUtils.checkPassword(String password)
    Validates password strength according to defined criteria: minimum length of 8, at least one uppercase, one lowercase, one digit, and one special character.

    Validates that the given date is not null and not in the past.
    static void
